headline.main: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers
headline.print_headline: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers

lead_paragraph: A Texas border town is working to restore what is believed to be the only remaining site that once helped process the millions of Mexicans who came to the U.S. as temporary guest workers under a program that started during World War II.
snippet: A Texas border town is working to restore what is believed to be the only remaining site that once helped process the millions of Mexicans who came to the U.S. as temporary guest workers under a program that started during World War II....
